original_title: The Shoji Tabuchi Christmas Show (Inspiring Songs of Faith and the Joyous Sights of the Christmas Season)
overview: Shoji Tabuchi and his magical violin presents inspiring songs of faith and joyous sights and sounds of the Christmas season with his talented faily.
title: The Shoji Tabuchi Christmas Show (Inspiring Songs of Faith and the Joyous Sights of the Christmas Season)
